name: Sample Twine Conversation
description:
A sample Twine game meant to help learn some simple Twine functionalities in Harlowe 2.1.0. This is meant to go in conjunction with some workshop notes.

The code is commented to hopefully clarify how and why some pages are working, so you can use "Twine Side" to open the project in Twine.

There may be more efficient ways to program the game, but this is meant to illustrate one way that it works.
